meanings.definition: In a higher position than something else.
meanings.sent1: The shelf above the table is empty.
meanings.sent2: The painting hangs above the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The cat climbed above the tree to escape the dog.
meanings.sent4: Her grades are above average in math class.
meanings.sent5: The clouds above the city turned pink at sunset.

meanings.definition: More than a certain amount or level.
meanings.sent1: The temperature is above normal for this time of year.
meanings.sent2: She scored above the passing mark on the test.
meanings.sent3: He ate above his usual amount of cookies at the party.
meanings.sent4: The music was playing above the acceptable volume.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was above what she had expected.

meanings.definition: Written or discussed earlier in a text.
meanings.sent1: The above paragraph explains the main idea.
meanings.sent2: Please refer to the above section for more details.
meanings.sent3: The above statement contradicts what was said before.
meanings.sent4: The above information is crucial for understanding the topic.
meanings.sent5: The above introduction sets the tone for the entire book.
